StringListProperty.Name: ResIdsMappingRules
StringListProperty.Description: Defines the mapping rules from C/C++ resource IDs to help resource IDs. Format: IDx_,HIDx_,<offset> with HIDx_ = IDx_ + <offset>

StringProperty.Name: CppResIdsFile
StringProperty.Description: Defines the path of the C/C++ header file (.h) containing the C/C++ resource IDs that will be mapped to help resource IDs.

StringProperty.Name: HelpResIdsFile
StringProperty.Description: Defines the path of the temporary help map file (.hm) that will contains the help resource IDs.

StringProperty.Name: TopicSynonymsFile
StringProperty.Description: Defines the path of the help topic's synonyms file.

StringProperty.Name: CppHelpMapFile
StringProperty.Description: Defines the path of the output C/C++ help map file.

StringProperty.Name: HelpFile
StringProperty.Description: Defines the path of the output help file (.chm).
